application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description:
Details of a travel plan pursuant to condition 20 of planning permission Ref: 162266VAR dated 05.10.2016 for "Variation of condition 2 (approved plans), condition 3 (materials), condition 4 (cycle parking), condition 8 (landscaping), condition 13 (ground investigation), condition 14 (remediation scheme), condition 16 (Japanese knotweed), condition 17 (Environment Agency access) and condition 18 (flooding) of planning permission ref PP/2015/1906 dated 29/02/2016 for 'Construction of part two storey, part three storey warehouse and showroom (sui genuis) comprising 3,157sqm of floorspace (following the demolition of the existing two storey showroom) including the provision of on-site servicing, cycle parking, 9 no. car parking spaces and associated landscaping'. Amendments to provide for internal and external alterations to the approved building including amended internal layout; alteration to openings, materials and roof panels; reduction in height and clarification on floorspace; relocation of bin store and car parking spaces; incorporation of bin store, landscaping, gates and bollards and amendment of conditions 3, 4, 8, 13, 14, 16, 17 and 18 from details conditions to prescriptive conditions"

Additional separate copy of The Survey of Daily Trips. (Also included within the Travel Plan)
